name: Electro-Ball
description:
Hit Fast!

Hit the targets before the time runs out!

Set your score in this amazing Pong-Like game with laser esthetics and techno music! Hit the ball against every upcoming target. 

But watch out for the timer! 
If it hits 0, it is Game Over!

Luckily the time resets after every target you hit! Good Luck

(This game was made for VimJam 2020)

Features:
  • Amazing visuals!
  • Techno Music!
  • Difficult Gameplay!
  • A hidden doggy!...wait what?
Controls:
  • [WASD/ZQSD] Move
  • [Left/Right] Turn
